default.shortDescription: Embed your application in Office documents
descriptionParagraphs: Content add-ins are surfaces that you can embed directly into Excel documents. You can use content add-ins to embed rich, web-based objects such as charts, data visualizations, or media into a worksheet or to give users access to interface controls that run code to modify the Excel document or display data from a data source. Use content add-ins when you want to embed functionality directly into the document.

items.name: Excel Content Add-in Humongous Insurance
items.description: The Humongous Insurance content add-in shows how you can use the new JavaScript API for Microsoft Excel 2016 to create a compelling Excel add-in.

detailItemCategories.name: Documentation
detailItemCategories.description: Here are the key resources around getting started on Microsoft Office Content Add-ins
